DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Effect Exercise Prescription - Psychological Perspective
DOC.detailed_description: Exercise prescription use initiate physical active lifestyle sedentary population . A Danish project call 'Exercise Prescription ' ( EoP ) implement primary healthcare . Patients eligible EoP non-institutionalised adult medically control lifestyle disease risk factor lifestyle disease , motivate change lifestyle , able improve health status physical active lifestyle , willing pay fee â‚¬100 intervention . The purpose study assess effect : 1 ) Self-efficacy , 2 ) Readiness change , 3 ) Decisional balance , 4 ) physical activity level , 5 ) health relate quality life . The EoP-group compare intervention group receive motivational counselling .
DOC.criteria: All patient refer Exercise Prescription scheme general practitioner Volunteer participate trial BMI 35
